Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Western (Forest Park Branch)
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Western (Forest Park Branch) due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Western (Forest Park Branch) due to a sick customer. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
